verses.verse: But now thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> that created <WH1254> thee <WH3290>, O Jacob, and he that formed <WH3335> thee <WH3478>, O Israel: Fear <WH3372> not <WH1350>, for I have redeemed thee <WH7121>; I have called thee by thy name <WH8034>, thou art mine.

When thou passest through <WH5674> the waters <WH4325>, I will be with thee <WH5104>; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow <WH7857> thee <WH3212>: when thou walkest through <WH1119> the fire <WH784>, thou shalt not be burned <WH3554>, neither shall the flame <WH3852> kindle upon thee <WH1197>.

For I am Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>, thy Saviour <WH3467>; I have given <WH5414> Egypt <WH4714> as thy ransom <WH3724>, Ethiopia <WH3568> and Seba in thy stead <WH5434>.

Since thou hast been precious <WH3365> in my sight <WH5869>, and honorable <WH3513>, and I have loved <WH157> thee <WH5414>; therefore will I give men <WH120> in thy stead <WH3816>, and peoples instead of thy life <WH5315>.
Fear <WH3372> not <WH935>; for I am with thee: I will bring thy seed <WH2233> from the east <WH4217>, and gather <WH6908> thee from the west <WH4628>;

I will say <WH559> to the north <WH6828>, Give up <WH5414>; and to the south <WH8486>, Keep not back <WH3607>; bring <WH935> my sons <WH1121> from far <WH7350>, and my daughters <WH1323> from the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>;
every one <WH3605> that is called <WH7121> by my name <WH8034>, and whom I have created <WH1254> for my glory <WH3519>, whom I have formed <WH3335>, yea <WH6213>, whom I have made.
Bring forth <WH3318> the blind <WH5787> people <WH5971> that have <WH3426> eyes <WH5869>, and the deaf <WH2795> that have ears <WH241>.

Let all the nations <WH1471> be gathered <WH6908> together <WH3162>, and let the peoples <WH3816> be assembled <WH622>: who among them can declare <WH5046> this <WH8085>, and show us former things <WH7223>? let them bring <WH5414> their witnesses <WH5707>, that they may be justified <WH6663>; or let them hear <WH8085>, and say <WH559>, It is truth <WH571>.

Ye are my witnesses <WH5707>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, and my servant <WH5650> whom I have chosen <WH977>; that ye may know <WH3045> and believe <WH539> me <WH995>, and understand that I am he <WH6440>: before me there was no God <WH410> formed <WH3335>, neither shall there be after me <WH310>.
I <WH3068>, even I, am Jehovah; and besides <WH1107> me there is no saviour <WH3467>.

I have declared <WH5046>, and I have saved <WH3467>, and I have showed <WH8085>; and there was no strange <WH2114> god among you <WH5707>: therefore ye are my witnesses, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, and I am God <WH410>.
Yea <WH3117>, since the day was I am he <WH5337>; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand <WH3027>: I will work <WH6466>, and who can hinder it <WH7725>?

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, your Redeemer <WH1350>, the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>: For your sake I have sent <WH7971> to Babylon <WH894>, and I will bring down <WH3381> all of them <WH1281> as fugitives <WH3778>, even the Chaldeans, in the ships <WH591> of their rejoicing <WH7440>.
I am Jehovah <WH3068>, your Holy One <WH6918>, the Creator <WH1254> of Israel <WH3478>, your King <WH4428>.
Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, who maketh <WH5414> a way <WH1870> in the sea <WH3220>, and a path <WH5410> in the mighty <WH5794> waters <WH4325>;

who bringeth forth <WH3318> the chariot <WH7393> and horse <WH5483>, the army <WH2428> and the mighty <WH5808> man <WH7901> (they lie down together <WH3162>, they shall not rise <WH6965>; they are extinct <WH1846>, they are quenched <WH3518> as a wick <WH6594>):
Remember <WH2142> ye not the former things <WH7223>, neither consider <WH995> the things of old <WH6931>.

Behold <WH6213>, I will do a new thing <WH2319>; now shall it spring forth <WH6779>; shall ye not know <WH3045> it <WH7760>? I will even make a way <WH1870> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and rivers <WH5104> in the desert <WH3452>.

The beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall honor <WH3513> me <WH8577>, the jackals and the ostriches <WH1323>; because I give <WH5414> waters <WH4325> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and rivers <WH5104> in the desert <WH3452>, to give drink <WH8248> to my people <WH5971>, my chosen <WH972>,
the <WH2098> people <WH5971> which I formed <WH3335> for myself <WH5608>, that they might set forth my praise <WH8416>.
Yet thou hast not called <WH7121> upon me <WH3290>, O Jacob; but thou hast been weary <WH3021> of me <WH3478>, O Israel.

Thou hast not brought <WH935> me of thy sheep <WH7716> for burnt-offerings <WH5930>; neither hast thou honored <WH3513> me with thy sacrifices <WH2077>. I have not burdened <WH5647> thee with offerings <WH4503>, nor wearied <WH3021> thee with frankincense <WH3828>.

Thou hast bought <WH7069> me no sweet cane <WH7070> with money <WH3701>, neither hast thou filled <WH7301> me with the fat <WH2459> of thy sacrifices <WH2077>; but thou hast burdened <WH5647> me with thy sins <WH2403>, thou hast wearied <WH3021> me with thine iniquities <WH5771>.
I <WH4229>, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions <WH6588> for mine own sake <WH2142>; and I will not remember thy sins <WH2403>.
Put me in remembrance <WH2142>; let us plead <WH8199> together <WH3162>: set thou forth <WH5608> thy cause <WH6663>, that thou mayest be justified.
Thy first <WH7223> father <WH1> sinned <WH2398>, and thy teachers <WH3887> have transgressed against me <WH6586>.
Therefore I will profane <WH2490> the princes <WH8269> of the sanctuary <WH6944>; and I will make <WH5414> Jacob <WH3290> a curse <WH2764>, and Israel <WH3478> a reviling <WH1421>.
